test_cases.test_name: Verify Document Assignment via Vendor UI
test_cases.objective: Ensure the system correctly assigns documents to users and groups using the vendor-provided UI.
prerequisites: Test user accounts and groups configured

test_steps.action: Log in to the vendor UI with admin credentials.
test_steps.expected_result: Admin dashboard is displayed successfully.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the document assignment section.
test_steps.expected_result: Document assignment interface is accessible.

test_steps.action: Assign a test document to a user and a group.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully assigned to the user and group.

acceptance_criteria: Document assignment is confirmed in the system logs.
User and group receive notification of assignment.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure assigned documents are accurately recorded.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the system sends automated reminders for document acknowledgment as per the vendor scheduler.
prerequisites: Test document assigned to a user

test_steps.action: Set up a test document with a due date for acknowledgment.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is configured with a due date.

test_steps.action: Wait for the scheduled reminder time.
test_steps.expected_result: Reminder is sent to the user at the scheduled time.

test_steps.action: Check the user's inbox for the reminder.
test_steps.expected_result: Reminder email is received by the user.

acceptance_criteria: Reminder is sent at the correct time.
User receives the reminder email.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure reminders are logged in the system.

test_cases.test_name: Document Assignment and Reminder Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that documents can be assigned to users/groups and automated reminders are sent as configured.
prerequisites: Test users and groups are configured

test_steps.action: Log in as an administrator and assign a test document to a user group using the vendor UI.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully assigned to the specified group.

test_steps.action: Configure the scheduler to send reminders for unacknowledged documents after 24 hours.
test_steps.expected_result: Reminder configuration is saved successfully.

test_steps.action: Wait 24 hours and verify that reminder notifications are sent to the assigned users.
test_steps.expected_result: Reminders are sent to all users who have not acknowledged the document.

acceptance_criteria: Documents are correctly assigned to specified users/groups.
Automated reminders are sent according to the configured schedule.
data_integrity_requirements: Reminder logs must include timestamps and recipient details

test_cases.test_name: Acknowledgment Reporting and Audit Trail Verification
test_cases.objective: Validate that acknowledgment reports are accurate and audit trails capture all required events.
prerequisites: Documents have been assigned to test users

test_steps.action: Generate a standard acknowledgment report for a test document.
test_steps.expected_result: Report displays all users who have/have not acknowledged the document.

test_steps.action: Export the audit trail for document assignments and acknowledgments.
test_steps.expected_result: Audit log contains complete records of all assignment and acknowledgment events.

test_steps.action: Verify report generation time with 50,000 test records.
test_steps.expected_result: Report completes generation in under 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Reports accurately reflect acknowledgment statuses.
Audit trails contain complete, unaltered records of all relevant events.
Performance meets the 10-second requirement for large datasets.
data_integrity_requirements: Reports must reflect current system state

test_cases.test_name: Verify document assignment and acknowledgment tracking
test_cases.objective: Ensure the system correctly assigns documents to users/groups and tracks acknowledgments as per URS-021-001 and URS-021-005.
prerequisites: Test users and groups are created

test_steps.action: Log in as an administrator and assign a test document to a user group via the vendor UI.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully assigned to the specified group.

test_steps.action: Log in as a test user from the assigned group and acknowledge the document.
test_steps.expected_result: Document acknowledgment is recorded with electronic signature.

test_steps.action: Generate an acknowledgment report for the assigned document.
test_steps.expected_result: Report displays the test user's acknowledgment status and details.

acceptance_criteria: Document assignment is successful
Acknowledgment is recorded with signature
Report reflects accurate acknowledgment data
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all assignment and acknowledgment events

test_cases.test_name: Validate AD group synchronization for document assignments
test_cases.objective: Verify the system correctly synchronizes user groups from Active Directory for document assignments as per URS-021-010.

test_steps.action: Create a new test group in Active Directory.
test_steps.expected_result: Group is successfully created in AD.

test_steps.action: Trigger a manual synchronization of AD groups in the document control system.
test_steps.expected_result: New AD group appears in the system's group list.

test_steps.action: Assign a document to the synchronized AD group via vendor UI.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully assigned to the AD-synchronized group.

acceptance_criteria: AD group is synchronized successfully
Document can be assigned to synchronized group
Group membership matches AD
data_integrity_requirements: Group synchronization must maintain data accuracy
Assignment records must reflect correct group membership

test_cases.test_name: Document Assignment and Reminder Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that documents can be assigned to users and groups and that automated reminders are sent as configured.

test_steps.action: Assign a test document to a user group using the vendor UI.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully assigned to the user group.

test_steps.action: Configure and trigger an automated reminder using the vendor scheduler.
test_steps.expected_result: Reminder is sent to the assigned user group.

acceptance_criteria: Document assignment is successful
Automated reminder is sent

test_cases.objective: Verify that standard acknowledgment reports can be generated within the specified time frame.

test_steps.action: Generate a standard acknowledgment report for 50,000 records.
test_steps.expected_result: Report is generated in less than 10 seconds.

acceptance_criteria: Report generation time is less than 10 seconds

test_cases.test_name: Document Assignment and Reminder Functionality Test
test_cases.objective: Verify that documents can be assigned to users/groups and automated reminders are sent as configured.
prerequisites: Test users and groups are created

test_steps.action: Log in as an administrator and assign a test document to a user group using the vendor UI.
test_steps.expected_result: Document is successfully assigned to the specified group.

test_steps.action: Configure and enable automated reminders for the assignment using the vendor scheduler.
test_steps.expected_result: Reminder settings are saved and scheduler is activated.

test_steps.action: Verify that test users in the group receive the reminder email at the scheduled time.
test_steps.expected_result: Reminder emails are delivered to all group members as expected.

acceptance_criteria: Documents can be successfully assigned to users and groups
Automated reminders are sent according to configured schedule
All expected recipients receive reminders
data_integrity_requirements: Assignment records must be complete and accurate

test_cases.objective: Verify system can handle 10,000 document assignments per day while maintaining acceptable performance.
prerequisites: Test user accounts are created in bulk

test_steps.action: Prepare a test script to simulate 10,000 document assignments to various user groups.
test_steps.expected_result: Test script is ready for execution with proper monitoring in place.

test_steps.action: Execute the test script to perform mass assignments over a 24-hour period.
test_steps.expected_result: All assignments are processed without system failures.

test_steps.action: Generate acknowledgment reports during peak load periods.
test_steps.expected_result: Reports are generated in less than 10 seconds for 50k records.

acceptance_criteria: System processes 10,000 assignments within 24 hours
Report generation time remains under 10 seconds during peak loads
System remains stable and responsive throughout test
data_integrity_requirements: All assignments must be accurately recorded
No data loss during high-volume operations
